trans-unit.source: Defines a base class for controls that support auto-scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: Define uma classe base para controlos que suportam o comportamento de deslocamento automático.

trans-unit.source: You do not typically use the ScrollableControl class directly.
trans-unit.target: Não, normalmente, utilizar a classe de ScrollableControl diretamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> classes inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>classes herdam desta classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollableControl class acts as a base class for controls that require the ability to scroll.
trans-unit.target: Atos de classe ScrollableControl como classe base para controlos que necessitam da capacidade de deslocar.

trans-unit.source: To enable a control to display scroll bars as needed, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A> property to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir um controlo a apresentar barras de deslocamento conforme necessário, configure o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade `true` e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A>propriedade para o tamanho pretendido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the control is sized smaller than the specified minimum size, or a child control is located outside the bounds of the control, the appropriate scroll bars are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo é um tamanho mais pequeno do que o tamanho mínimo especificado, ou um controlo subordinado está localizado fora dos limites do controlo, são apresentadas barras de deslocamento adequado.

trans-unit.source: To manually override which scroll bars are visible, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir manualmente as barras de deslocamento estão visíveis, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If either property is set to `false`, the corresponding scroll bar is not visible, even if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade está definida como `false`, a barra de deslocamento correspondente não é visível, mesmo que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event to know when the user or code scrolls the client area.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>eventos para saber quando o utilizador ou o código desloca a área de cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>

trans-unit.source: When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area.
trans-unit.target: Quando adicionar controlos programaticamente a um formulário, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>propriedade para a posição do controlo dentro ou fora da área de deslocamento visualizável atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default ScrollableControl constructor performs the following actions: - Marks the current instance as a container control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> style to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de ScrollableControl predefinido executa as ações seguintes:-marca a instância atual como um controlo de contentor ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>método para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>estilo para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Enables background erasing by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -Permite em segundo plano apagar definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>para `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: - Disables auto-scrolling by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling> bit to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -Desativa o deslocamento automático ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>método para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>bit para `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the scroll bars on the container based on the current control positions and the control currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta as barras de deslocamento no contentor com base nas posições de controlo atual e o controlo atualmente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: When required, the AdjustFormScrollbars method lays out the client area, including resizing the display area as required to accommodate the scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: Quando necessário, o método AdjustFormScrollbars dispõe de área de cliente, incluindo o redimensionamento área de apresentação, conforme necessário para acomodar as barras de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show the scroll bars; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para mostrar as barras de deslocamento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the container enables the user to scroll to any controls placed outside of its visible boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o contentor permite ao utilizador deslocar para quaisquer controlos colocados fora do respetivos limites visível.

trans-unit.source: When `true`, this property enables the container to have a virtual size that is larger than its visible boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Quando `true`, esta propriedade permite que o contentor para um tamanho virtual que é maior do que os respetivos limites visível.

trans-unit.source: There is currently a limitation in Windows Forms that prevents all classes derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> from acting properly when both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> is enabled and AutoScroll is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.
trans-unit.target: Não existe atualmente é uma limitação no Windows Forms que impede que todas as classes derivadas de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>de funcionar corretamente quando ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>está ativada e deslocamento automático está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: For example, let's say that you place a control such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>—or a container class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>)—on your form.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, digamos que coloque um controlo como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>— ou uma classe de contentor derivado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>(tal como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>) — o formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: If you set AutoScroll on the container to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> and then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> property on one or more of the controls inside of the container to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>, then no scrollbar ever appears.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o deslocamento automático no contentor para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>e, em seguida, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>propriedade num ou mais dos controlos no interior do contentor para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>, então não scrollbar alguma vez aparece.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>

trans-unit.source: The class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> acts as if AutoScroll were set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.
trans-unit.target: A classe derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>funciona como se deslocamento automático foram definido para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: Currently, the only workaround is to nest the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> inside another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente, a única solução é para aninhar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>dentro de outra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: For instance, if you need <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> to work in this situation, you can place it inside of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and set AutoScroll on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se é necessário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>trabalhar nesta situação, pode colocá-lo dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>controlo e defina o deslocamento automático <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > AutoScroll maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Deslocamento automático mantém a visibilidade das barras de deslocamento automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property to `true` has no effect when AutoScroll is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, a definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>propriedade `true` não tem qualquer efeito quando o deslocamento automático está ativado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the container enables auto-scrolling; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o contentor permite deslocamento automático; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho da margem de deslocamento automático.

trans-unit.source: The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control.
trans-unit.target: A margem de deslocamento automático é a distância entre todos os controlos subordinados e os limites do controlo principal deslocável.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollMargin size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine whether or not scroll bars are needed.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de AutoScrollMargin é adicionado para o tamanho de todos os controlos subordinados contidos no controlo deslocável para determinar se é ou não são necessárias as barras de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollMargin property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoScrollMargin é avaliada quando o controlo de deslocável principal foi redimensionado ou os controlos subordinados individuais são colocados em vista e é utilizada para determinar se devem apresentar barras de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Acrescentar controlos ancorados são excluídos dos cálculos que determinam se as barras de deslocamento devem ser apresentadas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a docked control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the control fills the parent scrollable control and the docked control is ignored when using the AutoScrollMargin to determine whether scroll bars are needed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se um controlo ancorado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, o controlo preenche o controlo de deslocável principal e o controlo ancorado é ignorado quando utilizar o AutoScrollMargin para determinar se são necessárias as barras de deslocamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the AutoScrollMargin property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se a distância do limite de um controlo subordinado para o controlo de deslocável principal é inferior ao valor atribuído à propriedade AutoScrollMargin e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, é apresentada a barra de deslocamento adequado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > We recommend, when docking controls within a scrollable control, that you add a child scrollable control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, to contain any other controls that might require scrolling.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >, Recomendamos que, quando um controlo deslocável, controlos de ancoragem que adicionar um controlo subordinado deslocável, tal como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>para conter quaisquer outros controlos que poderão necessitar de deslocamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: You should add the child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control to the scrollable control and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Deve adicionar o subordinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>controlo para o controlo deslocável e a respetiva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>e a respetiva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: You should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property of the parent scrollable control to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade do controlo principal deslocável para `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the height and width of the auto-scroll margin in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a altura e largura da margem de deslocamento automático em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> or <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> value assigned is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> ou <> </> *> valor atribuído é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the auto-scroll.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho mínimo do deslocamento automático.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollMinSize property is used to manage the screen size allocated to the automatic scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoScrollMinSize é utilizada para gerir o tamanho do ecrã atribuído a barras de deslocamento automático.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that determines the minimum size of the virtual area through which the user can scroll.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que determina o tamanho mínimo da área de virtual através do qual o utilizador pode deslocar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the auto-scroll position.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a localização da posição de deslocamento automático.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollPosition property represents the location of the visible portion of a scrollable control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoScrollPosition representa a localização da parte visível do controlo de deslocável.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the portion of the control that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para alterar a parte do controlo é apresentado.

trans-unit.source: When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the AutoScrollPosition property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area.
trans-unit.target: Quando adicionar controlos programaticamente a um formulário, utilize a propriedade de AutoScrollPosition para posicionar o controlo dentro ou fora da área de deslocamento visualizável atual.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> coordinate values retrieved are negative if the control has scrolled away from its starting position (0,0).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>coordenados valores obtidos são negativos se o controlo tem deslocar longe do respetiva posição inicial (0,0).</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, you must always assign positive <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values to set the scroll position relative to the starting position.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, tem sempre de atribuir positivo <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>valores para definir a posição de deslocamento relativos a posição inicial.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a horizontal scroll bar and you set x and y to 200, you move the scroll 200 pixels to the right; if you then set x and y to 100, the scroll appears to jump the left by 100 pixels, because you are setting it 100 pixels away from the starting position.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver uma barra de deslocamento horizontal e conjunto x e y para 200, mover os pixels deslocamento 200 à direita; Se, em seguida, conjunto x e y para 100, o deslocamento é apresentado ir à esquerda em 100 pixéis, porque a é defini-la 100 pixels na direção oposta à posição inicial.

trans-unit.source: In the first case, AutoScrollPosition returns {-200, 0}; in the second case, it returns {-100,0}.
trans-unit.target: No primeiro caso, AutoScrollPosition devolve {-200, 0;} no segundo caso, devolve {-100,0}.

trans-unit.source: To detect when AutoScrollPosition changes, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, save the old position value in a private variable, and compare the new value to the old value on subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> events.
trans-unit.target: Para detetar quando AutoScrollPosition mudar, crie um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>evento, guarde o valor de posição antigo numa variável privada e comparar o novo valor para o valor antigo no subsequentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the auto-scroll position in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa a posição de deslocamento automático em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador de controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> que contém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador do controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the virtual display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rectângulo que representa a área de apresentação virtual do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the DisplayRectangle property is the virtual size and position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, a propriedade de DisplayRectangle é o tamanho virtual e a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the width and height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> are both 100 pixels and the control contains controls that extend beyond its boundaries, DisplayRectangle represents the size the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> needs to be to include the contained controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a largura e altura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>são ambos 100 pixéis e o controlo contém controlos que se estendam para além do respetivos limites, DisplayRectangle representa o tamanho de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>tem de ser para incluir os controlos nele contidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A> properties of DisplayRectangle are relevant to the scroll position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A>Propriedades de DisplayRectangle são relevantes para a posição de deslocamento do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área de apresentação do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the dock padding settings for all edges of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as definições de preenchimento de ancoragem para todas as extremidades do controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property controls the border inside of this control for docked components.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade controla o limite no interior deste controlo para componentes ancorados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges> that represents the padding for all the edges of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges>que representa o preenchimento para todas as extremidades de um controlo ancorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified flag has been set.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o sinalizador especificado foi definido.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the flags the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> control uses.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte descreve os sinalizadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>controlar utiliza.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>|A mask used to retrieve whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible>|A mask used to retrieve whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible>|A mask used to retrieve whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateUserHasScrolled>|A mask used to retrieve whether the user has made the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> scroll.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateFullDrag>|A mask used to retrieve whether the user has enabled the full window drag-and-drop operation.|
trans-unit.target: | Valor | Descrição | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>| Uma máscara utilizada para obter se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está definida como `true`. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible>| Uma máscara utilizada para obter se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>está definida como `true`. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible>| Uma máscara utilizada para obter se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>está definida como `true`. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateUserHasScrolled>| Uma máscara utilizada para obter se o utilizador efetuou o deslocamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateFullDrag>| Uma máscara utilizada para obter se o utilizador ativou a operação de arrastar e largar janela completo. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateFullDrag> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateUserHasScrolled> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>

trans-unit.source: The flag to check.
trans-unit.target: O sinalizador para verificar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified flag has been set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver sido definido o sinalizador especificado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the characteristics associated with the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as características associadas a barra de deslocamento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties> class contains information about the scroll bar and its operation, such as whether it is enabled and visible, the scroll page size, orientation, display position, and so on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties>classe contém informações sobre a barra de deslocamento e a conclusão da operação, tais como quer seja ativado e visíveis, o tamanho da página de deslocamento, orientação, apresentar posição e assim sucessivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties"></xref> that contains information about the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a barra de deslocamento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the horizontal scroll bar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a barra de deslocamento horizontal está visível.

trans-unit.source: The functionality of the HScroll property can also be accomplished through calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible> as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade da propriedade HScroll também pode ser conseguida através de chamadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible>como parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically.
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>mantém automaticamente a visibilidade das barras de deslocamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the HScroll or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> properties to `true` have no effect when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, a definição de HScroll ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>Propriedades `true` não tem que tenha efeito quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está ativada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the horizontal scroll bar is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a barra de deslocamento horizontal está visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the vertical scroll bar is visible, which means that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the mouse wheel scrolls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> control vertically.
trans-unit.target: Se a barra de deslocamento vertical está visível, o que significa que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, desloca a roda do rato através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>controlar verticalmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if only the horizontal scroll bar is visible, which means that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> is set to `false` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property to set to `true,` the mouse wheel scrolls horizontally.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se apenas a barra de deslocamento horizontal está visível, o que significa que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>está definido como `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>propriedade definida `true,` a roda do rato se desloca horizontal.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseWheel method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnMouseWheel também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnPaddingChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPaddingChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem de fundo do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPaintBackground também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnScroll method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnScroll também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona um controlo localização, tamanho, o preenchimento e margem.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: O fator através do qual irão ser escalados para a altura e largura do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valor que especifica os limites do controlo a utilizar ao definir o tamanho e posição.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Este método não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O fator de dimensionamento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O factor de escala vertical.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user or code scrolls through the client area.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador ou o código desloca através da área de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The Scroll event occurs when the user scrolls through the client area by interacting with the scroll bars, or when the user navigates between controls and the active control scrolls into view.
trans-unit.target: O evento de deslocamento ocorre quando o utilizador desloca através da área de cliente por interagir com as barras de deslocamento ou quando o utilizador navega entre controlos e o controlo activo desloca numa vista.

trans-unit.source: The Scroll event also occurs when you write code, such as setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> property, that scrolls through the client area.
trans-unit.target: O evento de deslocamento ocorre também quando escrever o código, tal como a definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>propriedade, o que desloca através da área de cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A> property in your event handler to determine the scroll bar orientation for the Scroll event.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>propriedade o processador de eventos para determinar a orientação de barra de deslocamento para o evento de deslocamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the specified child control into view on an auto-scroll enabled control.
trans-unit.target: Desloca o controlo subordinado especificado na vista de um controlo de deslocamento automático ativado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property must be set to `true`, and at least one of the scroll bars, horizontal or vertical, must also be visible, for the ScrollControlIntoView method to have an effect.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade tem de ser definida como `true`, e, pelo menos, um dos barras de deslocamento, horizontal ou vertical, também tem de estar visível, para o método ScrollControlIntoView ter um efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make the horizontal and vertical scroll bars visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> properties, respectively, must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar as barras de deslocamento horizontal e vertical visíveis, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>Propriedades, respetivamente, tem de ser definidas `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `activeControl` parameter is not a child control, no action takes place.
trans-unit.target: Se o `activeControl` parâmetro não é um controlo subordinado, não ocorre nenhuma ação.

trans-unit.source: This method may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>

trans-unit.source: The child control to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: O controlo subordinado de deslocar para a vista.

trans-unit.source: Determines the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll*> property.
trans-unit.target: Determina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll*>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateAutoScrolling field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo de ScrollStateAutoScrolling é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: You can use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizá-la com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos para obter e definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the user has enabled full window drag.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o utilizador ativou arrastar janela completa.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateFullDrag field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo de ScrollStateFullDrag é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set whether the user has enabled full window drag.
trans-unit.target: Utilizá-la com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos para obter e definir se o utilizador ativou completa janela arraste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: When full window drag is enabled, the contents of windows are displayed when the user moves and sizes the windows.
trans-unit.target: Quando a arrastar janela completo está ativada, o conteúdo do windows é apresentado quando o utilizador move e tamanhos do windows.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll*>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateHScrollVisible field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo de ScrollStateHScrollVisible é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizá-la com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos para obter e definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the user had scrolled through the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o utilizador tinha deslocar através de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateUserHasScrolled field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo de ScrollStateUserHasScrolled é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> method to get whether the user had scrolled through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizá-la com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>método para obter se o utilizador tinha deslocar através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll*>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateVScrollVisible field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo de ScrollStateVScrollVisible é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizá-la com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos para obter e definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the scroll offset to the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o desvio de deslocamento para o controlo subordinado especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A> method uses the ScrollToControl method to calculate how far it must scroll to display the specified control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A>método utiliza o método ScrollToControl para calcular até que ponto tem deslocar para apresentar o controlo especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoScrollOffset%2A> property of the child control is used to adjust the scrolled position.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoScrollOffset%2A>propriedade do controlo subordinado é utilizada para ajustar a posição scrolled.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoScrollOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: ScrollToControl does not cause scrolling; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A> method is typically used to subsequently scroll to the calculated position.
trans-unit.target: ScrollToControl não irá causar deslocamento; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A>método é normalmente utilizado para, subsequentemente, desloque-se para a posição calculada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child control to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: O controlo subordinado de deslocar para a vista.

trans-unit.source: The upper-left hand <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> of the display area relative to the client area required to scroll the control into view.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de superior esquerda <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> da área de apresentação relativamente à área de cliente necessária para deslocar o controlo numa vista.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the auto-scroll margins.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho das margens do deslocamento automático.

trans-unit.source: The margin sets the width and height of the border around each control.
trans-unit.target: A margem define a largura e altura do limite em redor cada controlo.

trans-unit.source: This margin is used to determine when scroll bars are needed on the container and where to scroll to when a control is selected.
trans-unit.target: Este margem é utilizada para determinar quando barras de deslocamento são necessárias no contentor e onde de deslocar para quando um controlo é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a negative number is passed in as the `x` or `y` values, the value will be reset to 0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se um número negativo é transmitido como o `x` ou `y` valores, o valor serão repostos para 0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>valor.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>valor.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Positions the display window to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Positions a janela de visualização para o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A> property is the virtual size and position displayed client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A>propriedade é o tamanho virtual e a área de cliente de posição apresentada do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the SetDisplayRectLocation method to scroll through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> to the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método SetDisplayRectLocation para deslocar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>à posição especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset at which to position the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal no qual pretende posicionar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset at which to position the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento vertical no qual pretende posicionar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified scroll state flag.
trans-unit.target: Define o sinalizador de estado de deslocamento especificado.

trans-unit.source: When the bit parameter is set to one of the fields of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class, the SetScrollState method updates the state of the control to the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando o parâmetro de bits é definido para um dos campos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>classe, o método SetScrollState atualiza o estado do controlo para o `value` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the valid parameters and their values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os parâmetros válidos e os respetivos valores, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The scroll state flag to set.
trans-unit.target: O sinalizador de estado de deslocamento para definir.

trans-unit.source: The value to set the flag.
trans-unit.target: O valor para definir o sinalizador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the characteristics associated with the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as características associadas a barra de deslocamento vertical.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties> class contains information about the scroll bar and its operation, such as whether it is enabled and visible, the scroll page size, orientation, display position, and so on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties>classe contém informações sobre a barra de deslocamento e a conclusão da operação, tais como quer seja ativado e visíveis, o tamanho da página de deslocamento, orientação, apresentar posição e assim sucessivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties"></xref> that contains information about the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a barra de deslocamento vertical.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the vertical scroll bar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a barra de deslocamento vertical está visível.

trans-unit.source: The functionality of the VScroll property can also be accomplished through calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible> as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade da propriedade VScroll também pode ser conseguida através de chamadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible>como parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically.
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>mantém automaticamente a visibilidade das barras de deslocamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> or VScroll properties to `true` have no effect when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, a definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>ou propriedades de VScroll `true` não tem que tenha efeito quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está ativada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the vertical scroll bar is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a barra de deslocamento vertical está visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
